segments.text: I see the water overflowing from the sink, creating a puddle on the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's such a waste of water, and no one seems to notice.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman at the sink is just polishing a plate, completely oblivious.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't believe how unaware she is of the mess around her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The children behind her are being quite mischievous, reaching for cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is standing on a stool that looks like it could tip over any second.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel a bit frustrated watching this scene unfold.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is waiting patiently for her cookie, arm outstretched.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope the woman notices the water soon before someone slips.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The whole scene is a mix of innocence and potential danger.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't help but feel a bit annoyed at the lack of awareness.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's a snapshot of a moment that could turn chaotic at any second.
segments.speaker: PAR
